FINGLASS P.J., C. COLLARD and N.J. RICHARDSON (Edd.), Hesperos. Studies in Ancient Greek Poetry Presented to M.L. West on his Seventieth Birthday.
Oxford, Oxford University Press, 2007, 8°, lvi-406 pp., 1 front. ISBN 978-0-19-928568-6. £89.

25 contributions. - Pp. xix: K.J. DOVER, Encomium [in Greek]; - xx-xxviii: M.L.W., 'Forward into the Past'. Acceptance Speech for the Balzan Prize in Classical Antiquity, 2000; - xxix-lvi: The Academic Publications of M.L. West; - 399-406: Index.
